title: What EAMCET rank should I get to join Andhra University? - Quora
tags: Engineering Agricultural and Medical Common Entrance Test (EAMCET)

response.answer_text: It depends on the course one would like to join university and rank obtained in the entrance examination of EAMCET. However, it also depends on the category for which admission will be sought i.e General, OBC, SC/ST, Marks in the qualifying examination. As 25% weightage will be given to qualifying examination i.e Intermediate or Plus 2, it will also have an impact in getting the rank in EAMCET.

It depends on the branch you want join in the university. There are many branches in the engineering course .If you want to join CSE you need to get below 1000 and the next opted branch is ECE .There are many less known branches like instrumentation and geo Informatics which have equal or sometimes more placement opportunities than CSE branch. hope it is helpful!
